name: DeepSquare
highlight: Decentralized cloud computing ecosystem enables supercomputing for AI, rendering, and other heavy workloads, providing limitless computational power and fostering collaboration and innovation
summary: DeepSquare is a gamechanger in the world of cloud computing, with a unique business and delivery model that is owned, served, and grown by an expanding community of actors in its inclusive ecosystem. Its foundation of sustainability offers a serverless experience with intelligent workload distribution, providing a unified experience across all clouds. As businesses increasingly utilize generative AI and other advanced technologies, DeepSquare's supercomputer performance meets the growing demand for compute power. With a focus on cost efficiency and fair and transparent pricing, DeepSquare offers an ideal alternative to the costly, complex, and centralized clouds.
